#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
	ll i,len,count=0;
	string str;
	char ch[110],search;
	cin>>str>>search;
	len=str.length();
	strcpy(ch,str.c_str());
	for(i=0;i<len;i++)
	{
		if(ch[i]==search)
			count++;
	}
	cout<<count<<endl;
	return 0;
}
